codetemplate.code: <DockLayout stretchLastChild="true"> <Label dock="top" text="I am on top!"></Label> </DockLayout>

<GridLayout rows="auto, auto, auto" columns="auto, auto, auto"> <Label text="0, 0" row="0" col="0"></Label> <Label text="0, 1" row="0" col="1"></Label> <Label text="0, 2" row="0" col="2"></Label> <Label text="1, 0" row="1" col="0"></Label> <Label text="1, 1" row="1" col="1"></Label> <Label text="1, 2" row="1" col="2"></Label> <Label text="2, 0" row="2" col="0"></Label> <Label text="2, 1" row="2" col="1"></Label> <Label text="2, 2" row="2" col="2"></Label> </GridLayout>

<GridLayout rows="auto, auto, auto, auto" columns="auto, auto, auto"> <Label text="0, 0" row="0" col="0"></Label> <Label text="0, 1" row="0" col="1"></Label> <Label text="0, 2" row="0" col="2"></Label> <Label text="1, 0" row="1" col="0"></Label> <Label text="1, 1" row="1" col="1"></Label> <Label text="1, 2" row="1" col="2"></Label> <Label text="2, 0" row="2" col="0"></Label> <Label text="2, 1" row="2" col="1"></Label> <Label text="2, 2" row="2" col="2"></Label> <Label text="3, 0" row="3" col="0"></Label> <Label text="3, 1" row="3" col="1"></Label> <Label text="3, 2" row="3" col="2"></Label> </GridLayout>

<ActionBar> <StackLayout orientation="horizontal" ios:horizontalAlignment="center" android:horizontalAlignment="left"> <Label text="${cursor}"></Label> </StackLayout> <ActionItem (tap)="${cursor}" ios.position="right"> <Button class="${cursor}" text="Right"></Button> </ActionItem> </ActionBar>

<TabView #tabView> <TabViewItem title="Tab 1"> <Label text="This is Label in Tab 1"></Label> </TabViewItem> <TabViewItem title="Tab 2"> <Label text="This is Label in Tab 2"></Label> </TabViewItem> </TabView> ${cursor}

<ActionBar title="Title" icon="${cursor}"> <NavigationButton text="Back" android.systemIcon="ic_menu_back"></NavigationButton> <ActionItem (tap)="${cursor}" ios.position="right"> <Button class="${cursor}" text="Right" (tap)="${cursor}"></Button> </ActionItem> </ActionBar>

<GridLayout rows="auto, auto" columns="auto, auto"> <Label text="0, 0" row="0" col="0"></Label> <Label text="0, 1" row="0" col="1"></Label> <Label text="1, 0" row="1" col="0"></Label> <Label text="1, 1" row="1" col="1"></Label> </GridLayout>

<ActionBar title="Title" icon="${cursor}"> <ActionItem (tap)="${cursor}"> <Button class="${cursor}" text="Left"></Button> </ActionItem> <ActionItem (tap)="${cursor}" ios.position="right"> <Button class="${cursor}" text="Right"></Button> </ActionItem> </ActionBar>
<AbsoluteLayout> <Label text="This is Label 1" top="${cursor}" right="${cursor}" bottom="${cursor}" left="${cursor}"></Label> ${cursor} </AbsoluteLayout>

<GridLayout rows="*, *, *, *" columns="*, *, *, *"> <Label text="0, 0" row="0" col="0"></Label> <Label text="0, 1" row="0" col="1"></Label> <Label text="0, 2" row="0" col="2"></Label> <Label text="0, 3" row="0" col="3"></Label> <Label text="1, 0" row="1" col="0"></Label> <Label text="1, 1" row="1" col="1"></Label> <Label text="1, 2" row="1" col="2"></Label> <Label text="1, 3" row="1" col="3"></Label> <Label text="2, 0" row="2" col="0"></Label> <Label text="2, 1" row="2" col="1"></Label> <Label text="2, 2" row="2" col="2"></Label> <Label text="2, 3" row="2" col="3"></Label> <Label text="3, 0" row="3" col="0"></Label> <Label text="3, 1" row="3" col="1"></Label> <Label text="3, 2" row="3" col="2"></Label> <Label text="3, 3" row="3" col="3"></Label> </GridLayout>

<GridLayout rows="*, *" columns="*, *"> <Label text="0, 0" row="0" col="0"></Label> <Label text="0, 1" row="0" col="1"></Label> <Label text="1, 0" row="1" col="0"></Label> <Label text="1, 1" row="1" col="1"></Label> </GridLayout>

<GridLayout rows="auto, auto, auto, auto" columns="auto, auto, auto, auto"> <Label text="0, 0" row="0" col="0"></Label> <Label text="0, 1" row="0" col="1"></Label> <Label text="0, 2" row="0" col="2"></Label> <Label text="0, 3" row="0" col="3"></Label> <Label text="1, 0" row="1" col="0"></Label> <Label text="1, 1" row="1" col="1"></Label> <Label text="1, 2" row="1" col="2"></Label> <Label text="1, 3" row="1" col="3"></Label> <Label text="2, 0" row="2" col="0"></Label> <Label text="2, 1" row="2" col="1"></Label> <Label text="2, 2" row="2" col="2"></Label> <Label text="2, 3" row="2" col="3"></Label> <Label text="3, 0" row="3" col="0"></Label> <Label text="3, 1" row="3" col="1"></Label> <Label text="3, 2" row="3" col="2"></Label> <Label text="3, 3" row="3" col="3"></Label> </GridLayout>

<GridLayout rows="*, *, *, *" columns="*, *, *"> <Label text="0, 0" row="0" col="0"></Label> <Label text="0, 1" row="0" col="1"></Label> <Label text="0, 2" row="0" col="2"></Label> <Label text="1, 0" row="1" col="0"></Label> <Label text="1, 1" row="1" col="1"></Label> <Label text="1, 2" row="1" col="2"></Label> <Label text="2, 0" row="2" col="0"></Label> <Label text="2, 1" row="2" col="1"></Label> <Label text="2, 2" row="2" col="2"></Label> <Label text="3, 0" row="3" col="0"></Label> <Label text="3, 1" row="3" col="1"></Label> <Label text="3, 2" row="3" col="2"></Label> </GridLayout>

<GridLayout rows="*, *, *" columns="*, *, *"> <Label text="0, 0" row="0" col="0"></Label> <Label text="0, 1" row="0" col="1"></Label> <Label text="0, 2" row="0" col="2"></Label> <Label text="1, 0" row="1" col="0"></Label> <Label text="1, 1" row="1" col="1"></Label> <Label text="1, 2" row="1" col="2"></Label> <Label text="2, 0" row="2" col="0"></Label> <Label text="2, 1" row="2" col="1"></Label> <Label text="2, 2" row="2" col="2"></Label> </GridLayout>
